DOC.brief_summary: This study assess impact systematic detection Rapid Diagnostic Test ( RDT ) treatment asymptomatic carrier malaria parasite ( P. falciparum ) COA566 number clinical malaria case child le 5 year age improvement hemoglobin level overall population .
DOC.brief_title: A Community Setting Study Malaria After Systematic Treatment Symptomatic Carriers P. Falciparum With COA566 ( CoartemÂ® )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Subjects diagnose Asymptomatic Carrier ( AC ) Rapid Diagnostic Test ( RDT ) . Subjects diagnose Symptomatic malaria episode , RDTconfirmed ( SMRC ) Exclusion : Body weight < 5 kg . Hypersensitivity artemetherlumefantrine excipients tablet dispersible tablet . Presence severe malaria sign symptom First trimester pregnancy . Family history congenital prolongation QTc interval sudden death clinical condition know prolong QTc interval history symptomatic cardiac arrhythmia , clinically relevant bradycardia severe cardiac disease . Taking drug know influence cardiac function prolong QTc interval , class IA III : neuroleptic , antidepressant agent , certain antibiotic include agent follow class : macrolides , fluoroquinolones , imidazole triazole antifungal agent , certain nonsedating antihistamine . Known disturbance electrolyte balance , e.g . hypokalemia hypomagnesemia . Taking drug may metabolize cytochrome enzyme CYP2D6
